description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.JFSYMnXBLNHZGnQR]{Noble Scion}

From your family fortune, a bank trust, personal investments, or similar source, you receive a regular income or allowance to support yourself and help maintain the comfortable lifestyle to which you are accustomed. At the beginning of every week, you receive 100 credits. You cannot buy permanent goods or items with this stipend, with the sole exception of clothing, which you may purchase. Examples of the kind of services and nonmaterial goods you might spend your stipend on are listed below. Any unused credits are lost at the start of the next week when you receive your new stipend.

  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SNa3WLH4kUYJP3I9.JournalEntryPage.m2QaMoUIFmUHppEC#lodgings]{Lodgings}, docking fees, taxes, tolls, and similar fees
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SNa3WLH4kUYJP3I9.JournalEntryPage.3HEG3Fq5UGxjkVyw]{Meals or restaurant dining} (Starfinder Armory 134)
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SNa3WLH4kUYJP3I9.JournalEntryPage.m2QaMoUIFmUHppEC#professional-services]{Professional services}
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SNa3WLH4kUYJP3I9.JournalEntryPage.gTTM9k4Cy5Bhxw14]{Transportation}
  • @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SNa3WLH4kUYJP3I9.JournalEntryPage.m2QaMoUIFmUHppEC#recharging-stations]{The use of recharging stations}
  • Invitations to exclusive events or entry into privileged locations
